alert.note: Alert for Clinch; Echols (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 05 at 9:22PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Columbia, northeastern Hamilton, southeastern Echols and southeastern Clinch Counties through 945 PM EDT... At 921 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Needmore, or 7 miles west of Fargo, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Fargo and Needmore. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
